attributes.action: get the Army in to sort the thugs and looters
attributes.additional_details:
we, the 99% of law obiding UK population feel that the police are now overwhelmed and need support from the armed forces to protect us from the voilence and criminal damage seen in recent days

as the media shows more and more of these thugs getting away without an officer in sight, more criminals are thinking its a free ride

its not. we want this to stop.. NOW
